name: CoroMaps-20
description:
Welcome to CoroMaps-20!

Here is our submission for GMTK GameJam 2020 - "Out of control" - Will you be able to restore calm and reason in this chaotic city struck by a devastating virus? Even if no one seems to be concerned by this pandemic, it's all on you to save the city and its citizen! Any resemblance to current situation is purely coincidental.

Your Goal! You have 1 min to prevent as many people as possible from contracting the virus. 

Rules are simple! Just click on infected people to heal them and make them immune for a few seconds.

Good luck !

EDIT: It seems that there is a bug with some computer when playing in browser: the camera goes up when right clicking the mouse. However it works fine when playing in fullscreen or playing with the executable.

Controls :

  • Right click (drag): move camera
  • Left click: heal a citizen

Misc :

This game was made using Unity. Assets are taken from Google Maps, background music and sound effects are royalty-free. 

Note - We had a really great time making this game. That's the third time for us but only our first using Unity - Feel free to let us know what you've thought of it! :)

Yurhi & Sh0rtCut457
